section.heading: Village of Elmira Heights urban renewal agency

content.p:
ยง 659. Village of Elmira Heights urban renewal agency. An urban
renewal agency, to be known as the village of Elmira Heights urban
renewal agency, is hereby established for the accomplishment of any or
all of the purposes specified in articles fifteen and fifteen-A of this
chapter and in accordance with article eighteen of the constitution of
the state of New York. It shall constitute a body corporate and politic,
and be perpetual in duration. It shall have the powers and duties now
or hereafter conferred by article fifteen-A of this chapter upon
municipal renewal agencies. It shall be organized in the manner
prescribed by and be subject to the provisions of article fifteen-A of
this chapter and the agency, its members, officers and employees and its
operations and activities shall in all respects be governed by the
provisions of such article.
